Text:
Hi there Who-He-iZ,I can't usually log in but I'm abroad right now,in Sunny Taiwan so I can finally say hello and thanks for all your uploads.It's great to see you still around.

All the best

Hi Happy! It's always a pleasure to hear from you. How we miss the good old days, when TPB was free for all. The great old guard is gone (and terribly missed!) These new kids on the block are just silent, an anonymous grey bunch with no character.
Happy, wherever you are, maybe looking for some sexy little China Girls in school uniforms and mini skirts in Taiwan ? Yum, what a thought ! Thx HAPPY... Be HAPPY !
OF COURSE that's why he's in Taiwan. WHY else would anyone go to that 3rd world shithole of a country?? LOL
